column1:
俺さま
一張羅

俺さまの一張羅が！
column2:
Aw, my Sunday best!
- あ～っ…おれさまのいっちょうらが！
#俺様おれさま:
  • I; me
    (Pronoun; pompous)
  • self-centered man; egotistical man; pompous man
    (Noun)
  • Other Forms　己様おれさま

#一帳羅いっちょうら:
  • one's (only) good suit (or kimono)
    (Noun)
  • Other Forms　一張羅いっちょうら
column3:
Darling in the FranXX Episode 2 - 04:52
https://i.imgur.com/4HBABt5.png

column1:
どうすん
どうする

ウワッ…どうすんだよこれ！
column2:
What are you gonna do about this?!
- うわっ…どうすんだよこれ！
#どうするか:
  • what would (you) do?; what to do about it
    (Expression)
  • Other Forms　どうしますか
column3:
Darling in the FranXX Episode 2 - 04:57
https://i.imgur.com/HZkIzLs.png

column1:
無視
無視する

俺さまを無視すんじゃねえ！
column2:
Hey! Don't ignore me!Do you know?
- …ておい！おれさまをむしすんじゃねえ！
#無視むし:
  • disregarding; ignoring
    (Noun; Suru verb)
column3:
Darling in the FranXX Episode 2 - 05:29
https://i.imgur.com/9VFIzSW.png

column1:
引き続き
世話
世話係
世話係をさせてもらいます

引き続きあなたたちのお世話係をさせてもらいます
column2:
I'll be your caretaker, just like I was in Garden.
- 世話係をさせてもらいます - like: you will receive the favor of having my as caretaker?
- ひきつづきあなたたちのおせわがかりをさせてもらいます
- GT: I will continue to take care of you
#引き続きひきつづき:
  • continuously; continually; without a break
    (Adverbial noun; Noun)
  • Other Forms　引続きひきつづき

#世話せわ:
  • looking after; help; aid; assistance
    (Noun; Suru verb)

#世話係せわがかり:
  • attendant; person who looks after one's needs; caretaker
    (Noun)
  • Other Forms　世話係りせわがかり
column3:
Darling in the FranXX Episode 2 - 05:45
https://i.imgur.com/LRFcWka.png

column1:
本部
指示
指示待ち

ゼロツーについては本部からの指示待ちなの
column2:
We're awaiting orders from HQ on what to do with Zero Two.
- （なな）ぜろつーについてはほんぶからのしじまちなの
#本部ほんぶ:
  • headquarters; head office; main office
    (Noun)

#指示しじ:
  • indication; denotation; designation
    (Noun; Suru verb)

#指示待ち:awaiting orders
column3:
Darling in the FranXX Episode 2 - 06:01
https://i.imgur.com/8MHkf9S.png

column1:
(start) 基本

基本あなたたちとは別行動よ
column2:
But in general, she won't be working with you guys.
- GT: Basically, act differently from you
- きほんあなたたちとはべつこうどうよ
#基本きほん:
  • basics; fundamentals; basis; foundation
    (Noun; No-adjective)

#別行動べつこうどう:
  • doing something separately (from the group); going off on one's own
    (Noun; Suru verb)
column3:
Darling in the FranXX Episode 2 - 06:03
https://i.imgur.com/fmmpYdr.png

column1:
居心地
居心地良い

な～んだこっちのほうが居心地よさそうだったのに
column2:
Aw, but this table felt more comfortable.
- （ぜろつー）な～んだこっちのほうがきょここちよさそうだったのに
#居心地いごこち:
  • comfort
    (Noun)

#居心地良いいごこちよい:
  • comfortable (to live in); snug; cozy; cosy
    (I-adjective)
  • Other Forms　居心地よいいごこちよい

#居心地が良いいごこちがよい:
  • comfortable (to live in); snug; cosy; cozy
    (Expression; I-adjective)
  • Other Forms　居心地がよいいごこちがよい

#居心地の良いいごこちのよい:
  • comfortable (to live in); snug; cozy; cosy
    (Expression; I-adjective)
  • Other Forms　居心地のよいいごこちのよい

#居心地のいいいごこちのいい:
  • comfortable (to live in); snug; cozy; cosy
    (Expression; I-adjective (yoi/ii class))
column3:
Darling in the FranXX Episode 2 - 06:08
https://i.imgur.com/NjSjkUV.png

column1:
のに (end)

彼が出て行けばいいのに。
column2:
Aw man, it would have been so good had he gone
- のに at the end of a sentence can be rendered as something like "if only it weren't the case that ~"
#のに:
  • if only; I wish
    (Particle)
  • in order to
    (Particle)
  • although; despite; even though; and yet
    (Particle)
column3: https://japanese.stackexchange.com/a/23228/36809

column1:
のに (end)

あの建物さえなければ、きれいな景色が見えるのに。
column2:
If only that building weren't there, we could see the beautiful scenery
- のに at the end of a sentence can be rendered as something like "if only it weren't the case that ~"
#のに:
  • if only; I wish
    (Particle)
  • in order to
    (Particle)
  • although; despite; even though; and yet
    (Particle)
column3: https://japanese.stackexchange.com/a/23228/36809

column1: 僕は元気いっぱい・気がたくさんね・元気がある
column2:
I'm full of energy / I have a lot of energy / I'm fine
#元気いっぱいげんきいっぱい:
  • brimming with health (vigor, vigour); full of vitality; full of health
    (Na-adjective; No-adjective; Adverb; Noun)
  • Other Forms　元気一杯げんきいっぱい
column3: Japanese podcast for beginners (Nihongo con Teppei)#1『元気ですか？について！』

column1: いろんな人がいますね
column2:
There are various people
#色んないろんな:
  • various
    (Pre-noun adjectival; usu. written as kana; Colloquialism)
column3: Japanese podcast for beginners (Nihongo con Teppei)#1『元気ですか？について！』

column2: Little by little every day

column1: それではまた皆さん
column2:
See you guys again
#其れではそれでは:
  • well then ...
    (Expression; usu. written as kana)
  • Other Forms　其れじゃそれじゃ、其じゃあそれじゃあ
column3: Japanese podcast for beginners (Nihongo con Teppei)#1『元気ですか？について！』

column1: どの位の期間日本語を勉強していますか
column2:
How long have you been studying Japanese
#どの位どのくらい:
  • how long; how far; how much
    (Expression; Adverbial noun; usu. written as kana)
  • Other Forms　何の位どのくらい、何のくらいどのくらい、何の位どのぐらい
column3: Japanese podcast for beginners (Nihongo con Teppei)#2『どのくらい日本語を勉強していますか？について！』

column1:
学習者
学習者の皆さん
応援
応援する

日本語学習者の皆さんをいつも応援するポッドキャスト
column2:
A podcast that always supports Japanese learners
- 同志の皆さん is okay to translate "comrades"
#学習者がくしゅうしゃ:
  • learner; student; scholar
    (Noun)

#応援おうえん:
  • aid; assistance; help; reinforcement; rooting; barracking; support; cheering
    (Noun; Suru verb)

column1: というわけで今日は今何時
column2:
So what time is it today
- 「てなわけで」＝「というようなわけで」（≒「というわけで」）- "with that being said" or "for that reason"

#大阪弁おおさかべん:
  • Ōsaka dialect
    (Noun)

#弁べん:
  • dialect; brogue; accent
    (Noun - used as a suffix)
  • speech; tongue; talk; eloquence
    (Noun)
  • Other Forms　辯べん、瓣べん、辨べん

(noun / phrase)だと
